title: How’s the BBA course in pesu ?
content:
Also how’s the crowd , and the faculty??
Is it worth it ??

comments.body: i have a friend in bba sports she said pesu all course are same and the clg is not upto what they had expected

Someone I know is studying bba (ecc) and they are not satisfied with almost everything.


And I'll be satisfied if u stop spamming the same question a zillion times
Thanks for the response but this is the first time I asked the question

I don't know if it was a glitch but I saw the same question thrice in the sub feed.

Sorry for that
